name: test-solo
description: HTML-based Snake game inspired by Nokia 5110 classic

scripts.format:check: echo '✅ Format check passed (no formatter configured for HTML/CSS/JS)'
scripts.format: echo '✅ Format complete (no formatter configured for HTML/CSS/JS)'
scripts.lint: echo '✅ Lint check passed (no linter configured for HTML/CSS/JS)'
scripts.typecheck: echo '✅ Type check passed (no TypeScript in this HTML/CSS/JS project)'
scripts.build: echo '✅ Build complete (static HTML/CSS/JS project)' && mkdir -p dist && cp -r *.html *.css *.js *.md dist/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'No files to copy yet'
scripts.dev: echo 'Open index.html in your browser for development'
scripts.test: echo '✅ Tests passed (no tests configured yet)'

author: slamb2k
